articles.title: Dow futures fall 600 points after Israel launches attack on Iran: Live updates - CNBC
articles.summary: Iran’s Revolutionary Guard Corps chief Hossein Salami killed in Israeli strike Dow futures fall 600 points after Israel launches attack on Iran: Live updates Traders work on the floor at the New York Stock Exchange (NYSE) in New York City, U. S., June 11, 2025. U.S. stock futures fell on Thursday night after Israel launched an airstrike attack on Iran.
